description:
At the law firm of Abrahamsen, Conaboy & Abrahamsen, clients in the Scranton area can find reliable and qualified counsel when facing some of life's most complex legal concerns. The attorneys at our law firm have decades of combined experience, and they understand what it takes to help you pursue the most beneficial outcome if you are suffering because of the negligent or reckless actions of another party. Our Pennsylvania legal team will fight for justice and fair compensation on your behalf.

We are dedicated to the rights and interests of those who have been injured in accidents and various types of personal injury incidents as well as families grieving the wrongful death of a loved one. Our law firm has won tens of millions of dollars on behalf of our clients in cases pertaining to the following types of accidents, illnesses and injuries:

  • Motor vehicle and trucking accidents
  • Mesothelioma and asbestos exposure
  • Workers' compensation claims
  • Medical malpractice
  • Construction accidents
  • Premises and products liability cases

Our experience allows us to effectively confront insurance companies, including bad faith insurance cases, litigation, denied claims and more. We can act as skilled negotiators in pursuit of a settlement or aggressive advocates in the courtroom on your behalf. Our goal is to protect your rights and hold liable parties accountable for your pain and suffering.

The team at Abrahamsen, Conaboy & Abrahamsen takes cases on a contingency fee basis, and it is proud to offer free initial consultations to prospective clients. At no cost or further obligation, you can discuss your case with an experienced attorney and discover the legal options available to you. We are also offering virtual consultations at this time. To schedule an appointment, contact our Pennsylvania law office or complete the contact form on our website.
